Subject: Increasing ARC writer pool size mid-crawl

What is the reason that number of writers in the ARC writer pool
cannot be increased mid-crawl? I increased the number of toe-threads
from 50 to 90, and all 90 are happily working, but I'm concerned that
there will be contention amongst the 5 writers that I started with.
